communications.title: February Monthly Lesson Fees
communications.body: Just a friendly reminder that February lesson fees are now past due... Please send your payment when you can.. Thanks! - Tiffany
communications.author: brian

communications.title: Who's practicing today?
communications.body: Remember I will be reviewing all the practice hubs this week... who is putting the work for some amazing results this week? - Happy learning!
communications.author: brian

communications.title: Piano Showcase Highlight - Halloween Showcase
communications.body:
What an incredible Halloween Showcase! The energy in the room was amazing, and every student brought their best to the piano. We heard confident rhythm, expressive phrasing, and so many smiles from the audience.

From the first notes to the final bow, the progress on display was huge. Students supported each other, handled nerves with grace, and played with real musicality. It was a joy to see how all the practice is paying off.

If you attended, thank you for cheering so loudly. If you couldn’t make it, we’ll share more clips and photos soon. Everyone should be proud of the way they showed up and played their hearts out.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Makeup Lessons This Saturday
communications.body:
We are hosting makeup lessons this Saturday between 10:00 AM and 2:00 PM. Reply if you would like a slot and we will confirm the time.

If you cannot make Saturday, let us know your availability and we will find another option that works for your schedule.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Watch for the ice on the front porch
communications.body:
Please use the side steps today — there is ice on the front porch and it is slick. Be safe coming in for your lesson.

We have put down salt and will re-check the walkway this afternoon. If conditions change we will update everyone right away.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: New Lesson Calendar!
communications.body:
The updated lesson calendar is live. Please review your times for the rest of the month and let us know if anything needs to shift.

If you need to swap a date, send a note with your preferred alternatives so we can adjust quickly.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Cancelling Todays Lessons - Illness
communications.body:
I am under the weather and need to cancel today’s lessons. We will follow up with makeup options shortly.

Thank you for understanding. Please check your email later today for rescheduling details.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Current Month Prorating
communications.body:
If your start date was mid-month, your invoice reflects a prorated amount. Please reach out if you have questions.

We can also help set up a consistent billing date going forward if that is easier for you.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Practice Check-ins This Week
communications.body:
This week we are focusing on steady rhythm and relaxed hands. Please plan to record a short 30-second clip and share it before your lesson.

If you need help setting up a recording space, send a quick note and we will guide you through a simple setup.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Studio Closed for Presidents Day
communications.body:
The studio will be closed on Presidents Day. Lessons scheduled for that day will be rescheduled automatically.

We will follow up with makeup options and confirm new times by the end of this week.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: New Warm-up Sheet Posted
communications.body:
We added a fresh warm-up sheet to help with finger independence and clean transitions. Please print it out or view it on a tablet.

We will use this in lessons for the next two weeks, so bring it with you if you can.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Snow Day Planning
communications.body:
We are watching the weather for later this week. If conditions worsen, we may shift to virtual lessons for one day.

We will text everyone by 8:00 AM that morning if any changes are needed.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Upcoming Recital Save the Date
communications.body:
Please save the date for our spring recital on March 23rd at 4:00 PM. Location details will be sent soon.

We will also share a sign-up sheet for performance order and any accompaniment needs.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Lesson Materials Pickup
communications.body:
New lesson materials are available for pickup at the front desk. If you prefer, we can send digital copies via email.

Please let us know your preference so we can keep everything organized for you.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Piano Tuning Reminder
communications.body:
If you have a home piano, this is a good time for a tuning. Consistent tuning helps your ear and makes practice more enjoyable.

We can recommend a local tuner if you need a contact.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Studio Playlist Refresh
communications.body:
We refreshed the studio playlist with new practice tracks. Try pairing them with your warm-ups to build tempo stability.

Let us know your favorites so we can feature student picks next month.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Practice Challenge Week
communications.body:
We are kicking off a friendly practice challenge next week. Aim for three focused sessions and track your minutes.

Everyone who completes the challenge will receive a small studio reward.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Reminder: Bring Your Notebook
communications.body:
Please bring your lesson notebook to each session so we can capture key notes and next steps.

If you need a new notebook, we have a few available at the studio.

If you have any questions, send a quick note and we will respond as soon as possible. Thanks for staying connected!

We appreciate your flexibility and will keep you updated with any changes.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Studio Spotlight: Student Progress
communications.body:
A quick spotlight on recent progress across the studio. We are hearing stronger left-hand balance and more confident counting in almost every lesson.

Keep leaning into slow practice this week and write down one thing you are proud of after each session.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Open Practice Room Hours
communications.body:
We will open the practice room for drop-ins on Wednesday from 3:00–5:00 PM. Space is first come, first served.

If you plan to stop by, send a quick message so we can plan monitors.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: New Listening Assignment
communications.body:
This week’s listening assignment is a short piano trio playlist focused on groove and dynamics. It is posted in the resources section.

Listen once without playing, then again while tapping the beat.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Holiday Week Schedule Reminder
communications.body:
Please double-check your holiday week schedule. Some lesson times are moved earlier due to travel plans.

If you need to swap, reply with two alternate options.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Sheet Music PDFs Uploaded
communications.body:
New PDFs for your current songs are uploaded and ready to download. Please print or save them before your lesson.

We will reference the markings together next week.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Metronome Challenge Results
communications.body:
Thank you for joining the metronome challenge! The average streak was 4 days, and several students hit 7.

We will keep the challenge going with a new tempo goal.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Studio Closed Early Friday
communications.body:
We will close the studio early this Friday at 3:00 PM for maintenance.

If your lesson is affected, we will reach out to reschedule.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Reminder: Tuition Auto-Pay
communications.body:
If you are using auto-pay, please verify your card on file before the 1st.

Reach out if you need help updating billing info.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: New Practice Journal Cards
communications.body:
Practice journal cards are available at the front desk. They are a simple way to track goals and wins.

Pick one up next time you are in the studio.
communications.author: Studio

communications.title: Community Recital Volunteers
communications.body:
We are looking for two volunteers to help with seating at the community recital.

If you can help, send a message and we will confirm details.
communications.author: Studio
